fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pick up another player. You may have up to 4 players in your car.
- Drop off a player inside your car.
- Nosedive into the ground, killing everyone inside, including yourself.
- With the Necronomicon, fucking drive away.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Necronomicon, you become a Flying Bus, allowing you to carry up to 40 other players. If this limit is reached, cope.
- You may pick up as many players per night as you'd like.
- You may drop off as many players per night as you'd like.
- You may pick up and drop off players in the same night.
- Players are notified if they are picked up or dropped off.
- All players in the car/bus have a private chat. You may choose to disable or enable this at any time, and the driver isn't publicly stated.
- Driving away removes you and everyone inside your car/bus from the game. You all win if the game ends before the end of the next day, otherwise you all lose, even if your original faction wins.
- If there are no living players left after driving away, this counts as a win for everyone who drove away.
- Yes, you can pick up Coven members.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose the Coven, OR successfully drive away.
